mapper.select: SELECT /* mzlist.selectMzList */ LIST_ID, USER_ID, LIST_NAME, CREATED_DATE FROM TB_MZ_LIST WHERE LIST_ID = #{mzListId}
SELECT /* mzlist.selectUserMzList */ USER_ID, LIST_ID, LIST_NAME, CREATED_DATE FROM TB_MZ_LIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT /* mzlist.selectRestaurantInMzList */ A.RESTAURANT_ID, A.RESTAURANT_NAME, A.RESTAURANT_ADDRESS, A.RESTAURANT_CATEGORY FROM TB_RESTAURANT A JOIN TB_MZ_LIST_RESTAURANT_REL B ON A.RESTAURANT_ID = B.RESTAURANT_ID WHERE B.LIST_ID = #{mzListId}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* mzlist.insertUserMzList */ INTO TB_MZ_LIST (LIST_ID, USER_ID, LIST_NAME, CREATED_DATE) VALUES (UUID(), #{userId}, #{mzListName}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'))
